Package co.edu.uptc.controller

Class PersonController

java.lang.Object
co.edu.uptc.controller.PersonController
public class PersonController extends Object
This class is for person management. The persons are saved in a HashSet

      public void loadPeople()

    • updateInformationFile

    • addPerson

      public boolean addPerson(String id, String name, String lastName, String role)
      This method creates a new Person and add to the Collection
      Parameters:
      id - id of the person
      name - only names
      lastName - person lastname
      role - the institution role
      Returns:
      true if the person was added to the collection. False if not.

    • assingAccount

      public boolean assingAccount(String id, Account acc)
      This method allows to assing an account to a person by id.
      Parameters:
      id - id of the person
      acc - account that the person own it.
      Returns:
      true if the assignment was successfully

    • getRole

      public Roles getRole(String role)
      This method allows to cast a string into a role.
      Parameters:
      role - the role in string
      Returns:
      a Roles type Object, null if the string isn't in the roles values.

    • findPersonById

      public Person findPersonById(String id)
      This method allows to return a Person Object only passing the id
      Parameters:
      id - person's id
      Returns:
      a Person Object if the id was found.

    • clonePerson

      public Person clonePerson(Person p)
      This method allows to replicate a Person Object with the same properties
      Parameters:
      p - The Person Object to clone
      Returns:
      a Person Object with te

    • createPersonByRole

      public Person createPersonByRole(String id, String name, String lastName, String role)
      This method creates a Person Object by Role, that means that depending on the role The method will create a Student, Professor, Admin or Secretary Object
      Parameters:
      id - person's id
      name - person's name
      lastName - person's lastname
      role - role of the person in the institute
      Returns:
      a person Object type (Student, Administrator, Secretary, Professor)

      public ArrayList<Account> getAccounts()
